title: DeepFace Framework for Python
description: DeepFaceDeepFace is a lightweight face recognition and facial attribute analysis package for Python. You can apply facial analysis with just a few lines of code. It is fully open source and available on PyPI. All you need is to call pip install deepface command. It supports the most popular face recognition models including VGG-Face, Google FaceNet, OpenFace, Facebook DeepFace. Besides, it can analyze facial attributes such as emotion, age, gender and race prediction as well in its facial attribute analysis module. Wide documentation is available at its GitHub repo: https://github.com/serengil/deepface There are many ways to support a project - starring⭐️ it is just one.
